definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 西鹿生拿鶴之後，又活了二百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: After Seth was born, Adam lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 亞當生塞特之後，又在世八百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years， and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 西鹿生拿鶴之後，又活了二百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: As for being adopted, I have no desire to find my real parents.
sentences.chinese: 身爲養女，我並不想找到自己的生身父母。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not take thee a wife, neither shalt thou have sons or daughters in this place.
sentences.chinese: 你在這地方不可娶妻，生兒養女。

sentences.english: And Salah lived after he begat Eber four hundred and three years， and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 沙拉生希伯之後又活了四百零三年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: Jehoiada chose two wives for him, and he had sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 耶何耶大爲他娶了兩個妻，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: And Reu lived after he begat Serug two hundred and seven years， and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 拉吳生西鹿之後，又活了二百零七年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: And after he became the father of Nahor, Serug lived 200 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 西鹿生拿鶴之後又活了二百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: And after he became the father of Arphaxad, Shem lived 500 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 閃生亞法撒之後又活了五百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: Jin Yue is foster daughter, marry two years ago profit of overhead of village manson Zhao.
sentences.chinese: 金月是養女，兩年前嫁給村裏石匠趙天利。

sentences.english: And Peleg lived after he begat Reu two hundred and nine years， and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 法勒生拉吳之後，又活了二百零九年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: And after he became the father of Shelah, Arphaxad lived 403 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 亞法撒生沙拉之後又活了四百零三年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: Jehoiada got for him two wives, and he had sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 耶何耶大爲他娶了兩個妻，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: It was common knowledge throughout the court that Leia was adopted into the Royal Family.
sentences.chinese: 萊婭是王族的養女，這是宮廷中盡人皆知的事實。

sentences.english: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters
sentences.chinese: 雅列生以諾之後，又活了八百年，並且生兒養女。

definition: the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement

marginalized people (not part of mainstream society)/marginal man (term coined by social psychologist Kurt Lewin, referring to a person in transition between two cultures or social groups, not fully belonging to either)
to stake all on one throw
to have lost both one's parents
to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage
